name: Fear and Anger
description: Surrealistrasyon//Şerif Gümüşbaş//Mixed Technique//As often seen, the contradictions between the feelings we observe and the underlying causes of feelings are interesting. Even more interesting, consciousness suppresses this, prevents it from being perceived, and the person continues to feel consistent//Drawing is an impressive language for me with its universal and differentiating structure in every viewer. I also love and use the automatism method because it is a pleasant and mysterious way to express myself and what I perceive about existence, the world, and life.
